title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, June 23, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Soviet poet Anna Akhmatova (1889), who spent 30 years writing her poem “Requiem” in pieces so that Stalin’s regime would not discover it.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
